com.ducksonflame.dynablaster

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • com.ducksonflame.dynablaster.Bomb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Bomb>

    public class Bomb
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.lang.Comparable<Bomb>
    Bomb class used for creating Bomb instances. Separates bombs of player 1 and 2 (to control max bomb limit). Implements Comparable to store in Board's sets.
    Contains modifiable settings:
    CHANGE_DELAY - Controls animation speed (default is 500).
    BOOM_DELAY - Controls explosion delay after placement (default is 1500).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int x,
            int y,
            Character p)
        Constructor decreases available bombs for player that placed the bomb. Assigns properties and starts the animation timer. Loads images.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate
        p - Player reference

        public void boom()
